explanation: [0-0] Against a brown background, there is a pink flamingo toy with large, round eyes and a yellow and black beak, its head tilted to the right.

[0-6] First, a right hand opens its beak from the right, squeezes toothpaste into the open mouth, then puts many colorful chocolate beans into its mouth, and then pours a little coke. Then a right hand closes the flamingo's mouth. The camera zooms out, showing the flamingo with purple legs and feet, sitting on the edge of a toilet and moving its neck.

[6-11] Then the scene switches to above a toilet with water in it. A brown toy poop falls from above into the toilet. A right hand picks up the toy poop from the right. The scene switches to a white surface with a glass container full of pink substance on it. A left hand holds the bottom of the toy poop from above and presses it upside down into the glass container. The scene switches again, a right hand takes the toy poop out of the glass container, leaving a poop-shaped groove in the glass container.
